title: iPhone 15 Pro Max
shortDescription: Titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and pro-grade camera system.
longDescription: The iPhone 15 Pro Max features a strong and light aerospace-grade titanium design. It introduces the A17 Pro chip for next-level gaming performance and a versatile 5x Telephoto camera. Includes a customizable Action button and USB-C with USB 3 speeds.

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
shortDescription: Galaxy AI, 200MP camera, and built-in S Pen.
longDescription: The Galaxy S24 Ultra is powered by Galaxy AI, offering features like Live Translate and Note Assist. It features a titanium frame and a stunning flat display. The 200MP camera system sets a new standard for mobile photography.

title: Google Pixel 8 Pro
shortDescription: The best of Google AI and the most advanced Pixel camera.
longDescription: Pixel 8 Pro is the all-pro phone engineered by Google. It’s sleek, sophisticated, and has the most powerful Google Tensor G3 chip yet. It features advanced AI for photo and video editing.

title: OnePlus 12
shortDescription: Smooth Beyond Belief. Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 flagship.
longDescription: OnePlus 12 redefined the meaning of smooth. With an industry-leading display, 50MP triple camera system, and ultra-fast charging, it's built for those who never settle.

title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra
shortDescription: Leica Optics, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3.
longDescription: Xiaomi 14 Ultra represents the peak of professional photography in a smartphone. Developed with Leica, it features a 1-inch sensor and incredible zoom capabilities.

title: iPad Pro 11 inch M4
shortDescription: Thin. Light. Powerful. The new M4 chip.
longDescription: The new iPad Pro is impossibly thin, featuring outrageous performance with the Apple M4 chip, a breakthrough Ultra Retina XDR display, and superfast Wi-Fi 6E.

title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
shortDescription: The biggest screen for the biggest ideas.
longDescription: The Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra features an massive 14.6 inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display. It is IP68 water and dust resistant, making it durable for any environment.

title: Microsoft Surface Pro 9
shortDescription: Laptop power with tablet flexibility.
longDescription: Surface Pro 9 gives you the tablet flexibility you want and the laptop performance and battery life you need to move through your day.

title: OnePlus Pad
shortDescription: The first ever tablet from OnePlus.
longDescription: The OnePlus Pad features a 144Hz 7:5 Read-Fit display and is powered by Dimensity 9000. It offers a smooth, fast experience for work and play.

title: Nothing Phone (2)
shortDescription: Come to the bright side. Glyph interface.
longDescription: Nothing Phone (2) features a uniquely designed Glyph Interface on the back, e Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 chip, and a 50MP dual camera setup.

title: MacBook Pro 14-inch M3 Pro
shortDescription: Mind-blowing power. Eye-opening display. Pro in every way.
longDescription: The 14-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Pro chip delivers extreme performance and amazing battery life. Featuring a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, a wide array of pro ports, and a sophisticated Space Black finish, it's designed for creators and developers who demand the best.

title: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14 (2024)
shortDescription: OLED Display, RTX 4070, Ultra-portable gaming.
longDescription: The 2024 Zephyrus G14 is a masterpiece of engineering. It features a gorgeous OLED Nebula Display and is powered by the latest Ryzen 9 processor and NVIDIA RTX 4070 graphics. All this power in a thin and light 14-inch chassis.

title: Dell XPS 13 Plus
shortDescription: Minimalist design, maximum performance.
longDescription: XPS 13 Plus is twice as powerful as before in the same size. It features 12th Gen Intel Core processors and an innovative capacitive touch function row and seamless glass haptic touchpad.

title: HP Spectre x360 14
shortDescription: The world's most advanced 2-in-1 laptop.
longDescription: The HP Spectre x360 laptop is powered by an Intel Core Ultra processor and features a stunning 2.8K OLED touchscreen. Its 360-degree hinge allows you to use it as a laptop or tablet.

title: Razer Blade 16 (2024)
shortDescription: Worlds first OLED 240Hz 16-inch display.
longDescription: The Razer Blade 16 is built for those who demand the best. With an RTX 4090 and an i9 processor, it offers desktop-class performance in a sleek, anodized aluminum body.

title: Mac Studio M2 Ultra
shortDescription: Powerhouse for pros. M2 Ultra chip.
longDescription: Mac Studio is an entirely new Mac desktop. It packs outrageous performance, extensive connectivity, and new capabilities into an unbelievably compact form.

title: Lenovo Yoga 9i Gen 8
shortDescription: Stunning OLED, rotating soundbar hinge.
longDescription: The Yoga 9i features a unique rotating soundbar and a 2.8K OLED screen. It’s a stylish and powerful 2-in-1 that’s perfect for entertainment and productivity.

title: MSI Stealth 16 Studio
shortDescription: Slim gaming laptop with Studio certification.
longDescription: The Stealth 16 Studio A13V comes with a slim and light design and high-end performance for both gaming and creative professional workflows.

title: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5
shortDescription: Sleek and portable with Alcantara finish.
longDescription: Surface Laptop 5 gives you the perfect balance of sleek design and speed with Intel 12th Gen processors and a vibrant PixelSense touchscreen.

title: Acer Swift Go 14
shortDescription: Thin, light, and OLED gorgeous.
longDescription: The Acer Swift Go 14 brings OLED brilliance and fast performance with Intel Core i7 to a lightweight design that’s ready to go anywhere.

title: Sony Alpha a7 IV Mirrorless Camera
shortDescription: Full-frame flagship performance for photos and movies.
longDescription: The Sony Alpha a7 IV is the ideal hybrid, providing breathtaking still imagery and evolved video technology with advanced connectivity. It features a newly developed 33MP Exmor R CMOS sensor and the latest BIONZ XR processing engine.

title: DJI Mini 4 Pro Fly More Combo
shortDescription: Mini to the Max. 4K HDR Video, 249g.
longDescription: DJI Mini 4 Pro is our most advanced mini-camera drone to date. It integrates powerful imaging capabilities, omnidirectional obstacle sensing, and ActiveTrack 360°. Includes the RC 2 controller and extra batteries.

title: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones
shortDescription: World-class noise cancelling with spatial audio.
longDescription: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones offer the ultimate listening experience. With breakthrough spatialized audio for more immersive listening and CustomTune technology for personalized sound.

title: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
shortDescription: Master of both worlds. 24.2MP Full-frame.
longDescription: The Canon EOS R6 Mark II sets a new benchmark with its unique blend of speed, stability, and cinematic video features. Perfect for wedding and sports photography.

title: GoPro HERO12 Black
shortDescription: Incredible image quality, even better HyperSmooth.
longDescription: HERO12 Black takes GoPro's best-in-class image quality to the next level with HDR, plus improved battery life and industry-leading HyperSmooth 6.0 video stabilization.

title: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless
shortDescription: Sixty-hour battery life and audiophile sound.
longDescription: The Momentum 4 Wireless once again raises the bar—delivering best-in-class sound quality with advanced Adaptive Noise Cancellation and exceptional comfort.

title: Marshall Emberton II Speaker
shortDescription: Compact portable speaker with loud and vibrant sound.
longDescription: Emberton II packs a punch. Two 2-inch full range drivers and two passive radiators deliver the heavy Marshall sound you know and love.

title: Insta360 X3 Action Camera
shortDescription: Magic in action. 5.7K 360 degree video.
longDescription: With 360-degree capture, action-ready hardware and AI-powered software, Insta360 X3 is the ultimate pocket camera. X3 makes it easy to capture and share your life.

title: JBL PartyBox Stage 320
shortDescription: Bring the party anywhere with powerful JBL Pro Sound.
longDescription: The JBL PartyBox Stage 320 turns any space into a party, a concert. Powerful JBL Pro Sound fills the air while an adaptive light show synced to the beat keeps the eyes busy.

title: Nikon Z8 Mirrorless Camera
shortDescription: The ultimate hybrid camera. 45.7MP.
longDescription: Built with flagship Z9 DNA, the Nikon Z8 is a compact, lightweight camera that delivers incredible video and still performance for professionals.

title: Sony PlayStation 5 Slim
shortDescription: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD.
longDescription: The PS5 Slim Disc Edition unleashes new gaming possibilities that you never anticipated. Enjoy smooth and fluid high frame rate gameplay at up to 120fps for compatible games, with support for 120Hz output on 4K displays.

title: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
shortDescription: 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, and 64GB internal storage.
longDescription: The Nintendo Switch OLED Model features a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen that makes colors pop. Whether you’re racing at top speeds or battling enemies, the OLED screen provides a rich gaming experience.

title: SteelSeries Apex Pro TKL (2023)
shortDescription: The world's fastest keyboard with OmniPoint 2.0 switches.
longDescription: The Apex Pro TKL is the fastest and most advanced keyboard, performing effortlessly for all undertakings, whether you need the fastest keystrokes in gaming to destroy the competition, or deliberate presses for typing accuracy.

title: Corsair Virtuoso RGB Wireless SE
shortDescription: High-fidelity gaming headset with spatial audio.
longDescription: The CORSAIR Virtuoso RGB Wireless SE delivers a high-fidelity audio experience, all-day comfort from its premium memory foam earpads, and hyper-fast connectivity with SLIPSTREAM WIRELESS technology.

title: Samsung Odyssey G7 32" Monitor
shortDescription: 1000R curved gaming monitor with 240Hz refresh rate.
longDescription: The Samsung Odyssey G7 is the world’s first 1000R curved gaming monitor, matching the curvature of the human eye for maximum immersion and minimal eye strain.

title: Logitech G Pro X Superlight 2
shortDescription: The world's fastest pro gaming mouse now even lighter.
longDescription: Trusted by top pros, the G PRO X SUPERLIGHT 2 features LIGHTFORCE hybrid switches and the HERO 2 sensor for incredible precision and reliability.

title: Elgato Stream Deck MK.2
shortDescription: 15 LCD keys to control your apps and tools.
longDescription: Stream Deck MK.2 features 15 customizable LCD keys to control apps and platforms. Use the app to drag and drop actions onto keys and put them to work.

title: Keychron Q1 Pro Wireless Keyboard
shortDescription: Full-metal QMK/VIA wireless mechanical keyboard.
longDescription: The Keychron Q1 Pro is a groundbreaking full metal wireless mechanical keyboard with QMK/VIA support for the ultimate typing and gaming experience.

title: Razer Leviathan V2 Soundbar
shortDescription: Multi-driver PC soundbar with subwoofer and RGB.
longDescription: The Razer Leviathan V2 is a multi-driver gaming soundbar and subwoofer featuring THX Spatial Audio and Razer Chroma RGB for total immersion.

title: Secretlab TITAN Evo 2024 Series
shortDescription: The ultimate gaming chair with adaptive lumbar support.
longDescription: Engineered for pro-grade support, the Secretlab TITAN Evo is the most technologically advanced gaming chair ever, providing personalized ergonomics for all-day comfort.

title: Apple Watch Ultra 2
shortDescription: The most rugged and capable Apple Watch.
longDescription: Apple Watch Ultra 2 is built for unparalleled performance. Light, rugged, and corrosion-resistant titanium case. Brightest Always-On Retina display. Precision dual-frequency GPS.

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic
shortDescription: The return of the iconic rotating bezel.
longDescription: Galaxy Watch 6 Classic features a timeless look with a rotating bezel for easy navigation. Advanced sleep coaching, heart health monitoring, and a 20% larger display.

title: Garmin fēnix 7X Pro Sapphire Solar
shortDescription: Multisport GPS watch with solar charging and built-in flashlight.
longDescription: The fēnix 7X Pro is the ultimate multisport GPS watch. Featuring a large 1.4-inch solar charged display, built-in LED flashlight, and advanced training metrics for endurance athletes.

title: Philips Hue Bridge & Bulb Starter Kit
shortDescription: Smart lighting for your home with 16 million colors.
longDescription: Set the mood in any room with the Philips Hue Starter Kit. Includes 3 smart bulbs and the Bridge, allowing you to control lights via app or voice.

title: August Wi-Fi Smart Lock (4th Gen)
shortDescription: Keyless entry for your home. No bridge required.
longDescription: The August Wi-Fi Smart Lock allows you to lock and unlock your door from anywhere. It attaches easily to your existing deadbolt.

title: Ecobee Smart Thermostat Premium
shortDescription: Built-in air quality monitor and Siri/Alexa support.
longDescription: The Ecobee Smart Thermostat Premium saves you money on energy while keeping you comfortable. Includes an extra sensor for balanced cooling/heating.

title: Google Nest Cam (Battery)
shortDescription: Wireless security camera for indoor and outdoor use.
longDescription: Nest Cam alerts you to what matters. It can tell the difference between a person, vehicle, and animal. Battery power means easy installation anywhere.

title: Whoop 4.0 Fitness Tracker
shortDescription: 24/7 fitness tracker with a subscription-based model.
longDescription: The most advanced WHOOP ever. Smaller, smarter, and designed with new biometric tracking including skin temperature and blood oxygen.

title: Aura Air Purifier
shortDescription: The world's smartest air management system.
longDescription: Aura Air filters and disinfects indoor air through a unique 4-stage purification process while monitoring air quality in real-time.

title: Withings Body Scan Smart Scale
shortDescription: Advanced body composition and segmental analysis.
longDescription: The most advanced smart scale ever. It provides segmental body composition, heart rate, and vascular age monitoring to give you a complete health picture.
